message: Let's be fair, Bob. A 55/45 split seems reasonable for us to start.
Alice, your initial offer was heavily skewed in your favor. I propose a 60/40 split as a more balanced starting point for negotiation.  Let's find a fair agreement.
Bob, I understand your point of view, but consider the inflation affecting me. I'm willing to meet in the middle - 52/48 seems fair.
